data.name: Guilded Hearts
data.detailed_description:
Follow the game's development!

Demo + Kickstarter Coming FALL 2022!



ðŸ§¡ Join the Discord Server
ðŸ§¡ Follow us on Twitter
ðŸ§¡ Development Blog


About the Game



All things considered, Julian (name changeable) lives a pretty normal life.

He does online university work, is hopelessly single (but has a habit of crushing on cute boys), and spends most of his free time on a fantasy MMO â€“ Lost Heroes.

Little does he know that Lost Heroes will be what pulls him into a new, budding romance...

Whether he pursues the arrogant pretty boy Guillermo, his charismatic roommate Casper, the coy store clerk Archie, or his mysterious guildmate Verdant, join Julian on an unexpected journey of self-discovery, heartache, and love.



  • Genre: BxB, slice-of-life, romance, drama
  • Rating: 18+ (SFW/PG-13 version also available)
  • Length: TBD
  • Routes: 4
  • Estimated Release: Q1 2023
  • Platforms: Windows/Mac/Linux, Android

  • â€‹Customizable MC (name, hair/eye/skin/shirt color, chat profile icon)
  • Skippable 18+ scenes
  • Multiple chat styles/interfaces
  • Accessibility options: OpenDyslexic font, closed captions, font size changing

Content/Trigger Warnings: Foul language, homophobia, domestic abuse, mentions of violence, cheating, petty crime, pornography, sex work, terminal illness/end of life care, HIV+ character

data.short_description: In this BxB visual novel, dive into the fantasy MMO world of Lost Heroes and discover true love among your guildmates.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750M or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.11+
  • Processor: 2+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750M or equivalent
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750M or equivalent
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
